text: yelm kl ma yadkhul fi al'ard min qtrat alma', wama yakhruj minha min alnbat walmaeadin walmyah, wama yanzil min alsama' min al'amtar walmalayikat walktb, wama yasead 'iilayha min almalayikat wafeal alkhlq. wahu alrahim bieibadih fala yeajl esathm baleqwbt, alghafur ldhnwb alttayibin 'iilayh almutawakilin elyh
